brood.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to keep thinking about something that you are worried or upset about
brood.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Don’t sit at home brooding all day.
There’s no point brooding over it – she’s gone.
brood.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: if a bird broods, it sits on its eggs to make the young birds break out
brood.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a family of young birds all born at the same time
brood.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: a family with a lot of children – used humorously
brood.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: Mary has a whole brood of grandchildren.
